name: Paradise Cleaning!
description:
Paradise Cleaning! is super-casual action game.
All you have to do is just cleaning out all dirty icons by dragging over them within the time limit.
There are 5+1 dirty icons and each of them can be cleaned by the corresponding Cleaning tools.--★Cute Heroines Introduction★--

◆　Arika Rossa Mareread　◆
"I can be with you... ah i, i gonna lose my mind..."



◆　Kanbe Ao　◆
"My motto is safety first! Let's get it guys!"



◆　Relfilym = Bergen　◆
"If you did your best, you may feel free to...grope my breast?"



◆　Kuko Shirase　◆
"Tee-hee-hee, you're funny. By the way, want some candy?"--★Features★--
・Easy design to play
・Various type of 4 heroines
・20 stages
・20 Kawaii CGs
・27 archivements
・No cleaning, No hentai
